TEXT.TITLE: SYNERGETICS <SYNG> GETS FLOOD CONTROL ORDER
TEXT.BODY: Synergetics International Inc said it has received a 300,000 dlr order for Remote Computer Systems to be used for flood control applications from the U.S. Army Corps of Engineers' Seattle district. Reuter
